defaultValue.description: The default value of the textarea used on initial render

isDisabled.description: Prevents textarea from being modified and appears disabled

isReadOnly.description: Prevents textarea from being modified but doesn't appear disabled

isRequired.description: Prevents textarea from being submitted without value

onBlur.description:
Function that fires when the textarea loses focus. It fires regardless of
    whether the value has changed.

onChange.description:
Function that fires when the textarea loses focus after the value
    changes

onFocus.description: Function that fires when the textarea gains focus

onInput.description: Function that fires the the textarea value changes

onKeyDown.description: Function that fires when a key is pressed down
